dict.acceptation: 热，热度，高温；热烈，激烈；（身体的）发烧，发热；发情；
使温暖，使热；激发…的感情，使兴奋；

sent.orig: With heater control unit in the HEAT position, operate engine with radiator cap in place.
sent.trans: 让暖器控制装置在heat位置，盖好散热器盖，操作引擎。

sent.orig: The HEAT is armed with two tandem warheads and an electronic-controlled timer fuse.
sent.trans: HEAT装备二级串联弹头和一个电子控制定时引信。

sent.orig: Heat transfer principle and enhancing heat transfer way of recuperative drier with volume heat are described.
sent.trans: 叙述了间壁式体积传热干燥器传热原理及强化传热的途径。

sent.orig: A heat pipe charge was ideal heat charge equipment to apply of engine waste gas heat.
sent.trans: 热管式换热器是进行内燃机尾气热量利用较为理想的换热装置。

sent.orig: Densely built areas of cities heat. This is known as the urban heat island heat-island effect.
sent.trans: 密集的建筑集中了城市的热量，就是所谓的都市热岛效应。
